dunes-script-module.name: getEntitiesBySystemFilter
dunes-script-module.param: Filter string as defined by the OData URI convention
Order by query as defined by the OData URI convention
Select query as defined by the OData URI convention
Top query for getting a subset of results as defined by the OData URI convention
Skip query for getting a subset of results as defined by the OData URI convention
dunes-script-module.script: return vCACEntityManager.readModelEntitiesBySystemQuery(host.id, modelName, entitySetName, filter, orderBy, select, top, skip, headers);
